# Get path to example ARD scripts, auto-generated by siera

siera comes bundled with some example ARD-producing scripts in its
\`inst/script\` directory. This function make them easy to access.

## Usage

``` r
ARD_script_example(path = NULL)
```

## Arguments

- path:

  Name of R file. If \`NULL\`, the example files will be listed.

## Value

A list of example R files (if path is NULL), or a file itself if path is
used.

## Examples

``` r
ARD_script_example()
#> [1] "ARD_Out14-1-1.R"   "ARD_Out14-3-1-1.R"
ARD_script_example("ARD_Out14-1-1.R")
#> [1] "/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/siera/script/ARD_Out14-1-1.R"
```
